backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles with access control plus a public contact form storing timestamped submissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying an email-update feature and related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme with extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and setting the site title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with main routes wrapped by the shared SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying brand, navigation links, services, and contact info using siteConfig values.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, CTA button, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering HeaderNav, page content via Outlet, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/marketing/CtaBlo: Reusable call‑to‑action section with title, description, and primary/secondary CTA links.
frontend/src/components/marketing/FaqAcc: Accordion component that displays a list of FAQs with toggleable answers.
frontend/src/components/marketing/IconBu: Renders a two-column grid of benefit items with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PlanCa: Pricing plan card showing plan details, features, and a CTA, with styling for popular plans.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Proble: Section listing common business problems in styled cards with destructive icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Displays a service with sections for what it is, why it matters, and its business impact.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Social: Shows testimonials and a case study with before/after metrics to demonstrate results.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThreeS: Presents a three-step process with icons, step numbers, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ValueP: Grid layout highlighting core values with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Whatsa: Simple WhatsApp CTA button linking to the configured contact number.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Site configuration object defining metadata, contact info, WhatsApp link, and CTA labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor, handling identity changes and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useContactForm.ts: Hook for submitting contact form data via the backend actor with mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for query hooks using React Query, currently minimal and ready for future additions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming, including light/dark modes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details, values, and marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form page with form state, submission handling, and marketing layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the home page with hero content, benefits, pricing highlights, and various marketing components.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays pricing plans, ROI details, and supporting marketing sections for the pricing page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page that renders a services list with marketing cards and a hero section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, feature requests, issues, and version info.
